FavQs API.dsc: Provides daily quotes from a variety of authors and topics.
FavQs API.limit: Free tier with no specific limitations mentioned.

Inspirational Quotes API.dsc: Provides random inspirational and motivational quotes.

Quotes REST API.dsc: Provides daily quotes on various categories such as inspiration, life, love, and others.
features: Categories such as inspiration, life, love, etc.
Quotes REST API.limit: Free for up to 50 requests per day.

They Said So Quotes.limit: Free tier provides access to 50 requests per day.
